description: This file contains tests for the authentication API of a task tracker application, verifying user registration, login, logout, and validation behaviors.

methods.name: beforeAll
methods.description: Sets up the test environment, initializes the server, connects to test database, and clears the User collection.

methods.name: afterAll
methods.description: Cleans up after tests by clearing the User collection, closing mongoose connection, and shutting down the server.

methods.name: it
methods.description: Defines individual test cases for registration, login, validation, and logout endpoints.
